attributes.action: Allow all British citizens to vote for the capital Mayor
attributes.additional_details: Because I am a proud British citizen who is totally despondent when I see my capital getting totally destroyed and wish to see a change in who runs my capital
attributes.background: Change the law on who is eligible to vote for the capitals lord mayor

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715511
